a259c14b-1218-4498-9c4b-7a4e61999223.name: 可选增益
a259c14b-1218-4498-9c4b-7a4e61999223.notes: Bonus to first influence roll made against one or more audience members after a successful performance.

872c3dfc-7f60-433d-9d55-ef8d8806be2f.name: 战斗反射
872c3dfc-7f60-433d-9d55-ef8d8806be2f.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

15eaee33-1182-4749-a064-da9d727ee8a6.name: Heroic Archer
15eaee33-1182-4749-a064-da9d727ee8a6.notes: Reduce arrow ready time by one round with roll/penalty and Acc bonus without aiming or ignore bulk

20d838f8-d03c-4afe-92b3-6204afb744cd.name: 幸运
20d838f8-d03c-4afe-92b3-6204afb744cd.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

f4a2f1f9-de78-4449-bcd5-368c47025bdd.name: Luck, Extraordinary
f4a2f1f9-de78-4449-bcd5-368c47025bdd.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

a126250d-7788-415f-9f93-f39cc4863ce5.name: 可选增益
a126250d-7788-415f-9f93-f39cc4863ce5.notes: 在天赋对应的技能检定失败后的避免遭受伤害的 HT 检定上获得加值

4b7cfd0f-3857-403a-bb5c-e8fcea42372f.name: 标志性装备
4b7cfd0f-3857-403a-bb5c-e8fcea42372f.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

e6e6509a-6747-4d66-b5d2-3b2a6d4350a9.name: Reaction Bonus
e6e6509a-6747-4d66-b5d2-3b2a6d4350a9.notes: Con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.

04922557-0eb8-4ca6-92aa-b379606099bb.name: 可选增益
04922557-0eb8-4ca6-92aa-b379606099bb.notes: 在抵抗天赋对应的技能上获得加值

dac0f0a1-3b5f-457a-aee6-6f4ffe24a144.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

b57c15ee-e1db-4850-99cd-7d05a9b52171.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

280cbb7a-c7a4-4de8-befe-d67726cab3b7.name: Vow (Own no more than what can be carried)

c1b89059-92d3-4a30-963a-2951f139ce59.name: Or 2 points to raise any one skill by a level

4893c442-bfec-4419-a1af-6f41a144b294.name: 2 points for another combat skill off the previous list; or 2 points to improve one of these choices by one level.

029e6ad4-50fd-4de3-9ebe-ea051f889885.name: 6 points to buy six additional secondary skill choices at one level lower.
